issue.title: N3639, N3497, N3467, N3412 Runtime-sized arrays with automatic storage duration

discussion.p: Reviewed by EWG in Portland 2012, proceeding to CWG. The library part is N2648 C++ Dynamic Arrays, and that part is proceeding to LWG.

p.p: Accepted into the Working Draft in Bristol 2013, as N3639.

discussion.p: Moved in Chicago 2013 to be designated for an Array Extension TS, which hasn't materialized yet.

issue.resolution: The paper contains the proposed wording, as does the Library counterpart.
